TopicTitle: ksp2 wont let me create a new saving

Articles.Content:
I bought ksp2 a few hours ago and i cant get it to work. my computer has a rtx 2060 and a intel i7 core 9th gen but for some reasons the game just freezes while loading it.

i have 3,20 gb of space in C and 248 gb in D, please tell me what i have done wrong because i really want to play this game. 

thanks
I freed up some space in c now it works
Interesting. We should create a mega-thread with what issues happened and how it was resolved
